title: The Screwtape Letters, Includes Screwtape Proposes a Toast
description: Dedicated to his friend J.R.R. Tolkien, this masterpiece of satire has entertained and enlightened millions of readers with its sly and ironic portrayal of human life from the vantage point of the demon Screwtape. At once wildly comic and strikingly original, the correspondence of the worldly-wise old devil to his nephew Wormwood shows C.S. Lewis at his darkest and most playful.This 60th anniversary edition includes for the first time Screwtape Proposes a Toast, in which the notorious Screwtape addresses a dinner at the Tempter's Training College for young devils...
author: C.S. Lewis
